short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension revolutionizing reading with dyslexia-friendly tools, making literature accessible and enjoyable for all.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read Easy is a browser extension designed to make literature more accessible and enjoyable for everyone, especially for individuals with dyslexia. By leveraging dyslexia-friendly tools, such as the OpenDyslexic font and text-to-speech features, Read Easy aims to enhance the reading experience for users with dyslexia.
